body.name: Living Room Lazy Chair with Ottoman & Armrest, Modern Comfy Folding Lounge Chair Reclining Sofa Leisure Chair Armchair with Footstool for Bedroom/Office/Hosting, Grey
features: 【Sturdy and stable construction】This modern lounge chair is made with a sturdy steel frame and powder coating process, it can serve you for a long time, and can withstand 300 pounds without shaking. In addition, the plastic feet on the bottom can not only effectively prevent the chair from sliding when sitting down, but also protect the floor from scratches.

【Foldable and Portable】The armchair can be assembled quickly, just by putting a few parts together, no screws or nuts and no tools required. And our lazy chair is made of breathable suede Made of fabric and high density PP cotton, it won't fade or slump even after years of heavy use.

【3 Position Adjustable】The back of the leisure chair could be adjusted in 3 gears. It could be used as a chair with armrests or chaise lounge. The small pocket hanging next to you can also put your mobile phone, tablet computer or magazines and other items to enjoy your leisure time.

【Easy to assemble and maintain】Everything you need for assembly is included in the package, no additional tools are required. Our lounge chairs are easy to assemble in a short time. Additionally, the chair is designed so that the cover is easily removable and machine washable, and the steel frame can be wiped down quickly with a damp cloth.

【Wide Application】The comfort reading chair is perfect as a bedroom living room, living room, reading room, or wherever you need stylish seating in your home or office. And the armchair weighs only 13.4 lbs/17 lbs, so you can easily move it from one room to another.
body.description: Features:Easy to Clean - This folding chair no assembly required, this cushion could be removable easily. It could be washed by machine or handy.Multi Function - Special designed with one-side pocket which can put books, magazines, newspapers, mobile phone into it.Adjustable - Designed with three adjustable position, whenever you were in reading, eating or sleeping, you can adjust the height of the backrest as your changeable of the stats.Protable Designed - It can be folded and stored when not needed, further saving storage space indoors and easy to carry when camping outdoors.Specifications:Material: Steel + PP cotton + Velvet fabricColor: grayItem dimensions:Chair seat to floor height: 24"Chair width: 20.8"/ 22"Chair length: 24.4"/ 26.7Ottoman size: 14.96" * 11.81" * 18.50"Item weight: 13.4 lbs/17 lbsWeight capacity: 300 lbsPackage Includes:1 * Foldable Lazy Chair1 * Ottoman

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Comfortable Chair
reviews.reviewText: It looks just like the picture in the add. I bought it for my son's new apartment until he gets the finances for furniture. He says that it is so comfortable that he fell asleep in it. He has been very happy with this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dont purchase this chair!
reviews.reviewText: I was so greatly disappointed, I ordered chair the 13th for Christmas present, I recieved it the 27th. This chair is not for the elderly at all. Once your in it, it's hard to get up out of. Cuts leg circulation off under your knees. To topped off this bad deal, I had to assume the cost of return shipping, the topper, found out the return shipping is almost as much as the chair. Now I am stuck with a chair in a box I wont use,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a convenient, very comfortable chair. It came together pretty easily after reading the instructions. I've actually fallen asleep in it due to the comfort which is rare because I have back problems. It's light but not too light. It took me a minute to trust the straps holding the chair together but they are solid and really hold up.The problems I ran into was mainly the arm cushions turning inward. Which is annoying more than anything but not uncomfortable. The top bar wouldn't fasten securely because the spring peg is missing on one side. And finally, the chair is a bit too tall. I'm 6'0" and it's a little too tall for me. None of these things bothered me too much.Overall, it's a really good chair for the price and I highly recommend it over most other portable chairs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Picture looks much better
reviews.reviewText: The chair itself is comfortable, but it's not as stylish as the picture and poor quality. I wanted for my office, but I am using it for my kids game room. I paid too much for this, it's nothing more than a padded lawn chair. It's easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Iz jusa Love it it's so cute comfortable got that new smell lol i like it. 💖

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemle
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for small office area with extra comfort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't Buy this Chair!!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is not for an adult. I was so grossly disappointed. But what made matters worse I had to assume the cost to return the item!! It was going to cost me nearly as much as the chair!!!! I nearly freaked out. Consequently, I didn't send it back. I found someone with a little child who could use the chair so I gifted the chair to them. BEWARE!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s perfect as a reading chair.
reviews.reviewText: For the price it’s good. It does fold up and can be carried and placed anywhere for convenience
